name: Jaasbook
tagline: All about the Java Authentication & Authorization Service - source code and other material for the unpublished JAAS in Action (circa 2005)
body:
Back in 2005 I was asked to write a book on JAAS, the Java Authentication and Authorization Service. The book didn't end up getting published, but here's the result.

I haven't checked this code in a long time, but it consistently gets comments over on [JaaSBook.com](http://jaasbook.com/). Hopefully I'll get around to fixing it up. I'm happy to have some folks help, of course.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
